path.wiser.mobile.ui
Class CameraActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      path.wiser.mobile.ui.CameraActivity

public class CameraActivity
extends Activity

This class will take care of taking photos from the androids camera and storing the picture in an appropriate place.

Author:
anisbet
